directorResidentialAddressLinkTitle: If the director's correspondence address changes in the future, do you want this to apply to their home address too?
directorResidentialAddressLinkYesHint: The director's home address will be recorded as the 'same as the correspondence address'. This means future changes will also apply to the director's home address.
directorResidentialAddressLinkNoHint: Youâ€™ll have to update the director's home address manually if it changes.
